meanings.definition: In a careful and deliberate manner
meanings.sent1: She walked choicely through the fragile garden, avoiding stepping on any flowers.
meanings.sent2: He examined the delicate china choicely, making sure not to break anything.
meanings.sent3: The cat moved choicely around the room, as if it knew it was being watched.
meanings.sent4: The sunlight filtered choicely through the leaves, creating a dappled pattern on the ground.
meanings.sent5: The old man spoke choicely, choosing his words with great precision.

meanings.definition: In a manner that shows careful selection or preference
meanings.sent1: She picked out her outfit choicely, making sure every detail matched perfectly.
meanings.sent2: He selected his words choicely, trying to avoid offending anyone.
meanings.sent3: The chef prepared the dish choicely, adding just the right amount of seasoning.
meanings.sent4: The artist arranged the colors choicely on the canvas, creating a harmonious composition.
meanings.sent5: The customer examined the products choicely before making a decision.
